instruction: Please refer to the exhibit below and compare the spreads of traditional senior and SNP bonds to determine the market view on the recovery rate for SNP bonds.
output: Based on the comparison of spreads of traditional senior and SNP bonds, it can be inferred that the market view on the recovery rate for SNP bonds is positive. The spread for SNP bonds is lower than that of traditional senior bonds, indicating that investors are more confident in the likelihood of recovering their investment in SNP bonds compared to traditional senior bonds.
